# Skience

**Website:** https://skience.com/  
**Category:** Wealth Management Platform  
**Status:** SaaS Verification Complete

---

## Overview

Skience is an industry-leading wealth management platform that streamlines and automates time-consuming, error-prone business processes for broker-dealers and RIAs. The platform features out-of-the-box integration with leading custodians and technology providers, empowering firms to unify their technology, increase productivity, and deliver a superior client experience.

**Primary Product:** SkienceONE - A cloud-based, Salesforce-based platform for digital client onboarding, wealth management, and advisor workflows.

- Data Consolidation & Replication

---

## Brief Description

Skience provides a unified wealth management platform built on Salesforce, connecting existing technology tools and enterprise partnerships to create a holistic advisor environment. The platform includes digital onboarding, new account opening, Regulation Best Interest compliance tools, and surveillance capabilities. Skience also offers consulting services to help financial services firms transform their businesses using cloud-based technology.
